title: Hedge Funds Buy Most Asian Stocks in a Decade, Goldman Says
description: Emerging and developed Asian markets saw the largest net-buying by hedge funds last week since Goldman Sachs Group Inc. Prime Services trading desk began tracking the data in 2016, as the region benefits from the optimism for AI infrastructure firms.
content: Emerging and developed Asian markets saw the largest net-buying by hedge funds last week since Goldman Sachs Group Inc. Prime Services trading desk began tracking the data in 2016, as the region benefits from the optimism for AI infrastructure firms.
